name: A Stylus Darkly
description: Dark styles for the "Stylus" Extension/Addon which is far-superior to the "Stylish" extension. Works on Firefox and Chrome. Different themes available via "Customize" button. Overwrites the source editor's "default" theme (leaves other themes alone for the most part).
additional_info: 2018-02-24: First release. Works on FF and Chrome.
